summary: Valiant Citadel pre-flight guidance: pull ORDER-060, run cadence/emitter smoke, verify attachments, and hold milestone commitments until M1/M3 owner/date confirmations land.

steps_for_valiant_citadel: Pull ORDER-060 and attached planning scrolls from hub; ensure SHAGI_EXCHANGE_PATH points at C:/Users/Admin/high_command_exchange.
Run cadence smoke: python tools/exchange_heartbeat.py; python tools/offline_sync_exchange.py; python -m tools.ops_readiness; python tools/exchange_all.py.
Run emitter smoke: python tools/factory_order_emitter.py --help (log output).
Confirm owner + target dates for M1 (core loop) and M3 (playtest slice) and reply to alignment ask.
Hold milestone commitments until cross-front M1/M3 confirmations are logged; share provisional dates if needed.
details.follow_up: Check for confirmations and nudge if absent after 30-60 minutes.
